meanings.definition: To combine or impregnate with carbon.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith carburises the iron to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic carburises the metal to enhance its durability.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally carburises the cake, giving it a unique charcoal flavor.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft carburises his work with passion and excellence.
meanings.sent5: The process of carburising the steel transforms it into a resilient material.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with carbon.
meanings.sent1: The scientist carburises the sample to study its carbon content.
meanings.sent2: The manufacturer carburises the alloy to improve its properties.
meanings.sent3: The artist playfully carburises the clay, creating a carbon-infused masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness carburises the atmosphere, making everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent5: The ancient technique of carburising metals has been used for centuries.
